member.name: M:_3DRadSpaceDll.Main.FindObject(System.Int32)

Finds an objects after it's id.
Time complexity is O(n) since GameObjects is a linked list.

member.name: M:_3DRadSpaceDll.Main.FindObject(System.String)
member.summary:
Finds an objects after it's name. If objects have the same name, the object with the lowest numerical ID will be returned.
Time complexity in the worst case is about O(n^2)

Time complexity is O(n), since the objects are stored in a linked list.

member.name: P:_3DRadSpaceDll.SoundEffect.SoundState
member.summary:
Gets or sets the current state of the sound.
Unlike SoundInstance.State, this property can be also set.
Setting this property to any value will call the Play(), Stop() and Pause() depinding on the value.

member.name: T:_3DRadSpaceDll.TimerEvent
member.summary: Raised everytime the timer exceeds the period.
member.param: Total time passed since the creation of the timer object.

member.name: T:_3DRadSpaceDll.Timer
member.summary: Executes an event everytime a 'period' passes for a number of times.

member.name: M:_3DRadSpaceDll.Timer.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.param: How much time the event will execute. Use uint.MaxValue to represent .

member.name: F:_3DRadSpaceDll.Timer.Period
member.summary: Defined the time in milliseconds between the timer event executions.

member.name: F:_3DRadSpaceDll.Timer.Repetitions
member.summary:
Defines how many times the event will get called.
Use uint.MaxValue Infinity to represent (infinity)

member.name: P:_3DRadSpaceDll.Timer.TotalTime
member.summary:
Counts the time passed.
Maximum value is Period * Repetitions
NOTE: Unsigned integer overflows will occur if the Period is a value representing ( uint.MaxValue )

member.name: E:_3DRadSpaceDll.Timer.OnTimerRepetition
member.summary: Raised everytime a repetition is complete.

member.name: F:_3DRadSpaceDll.Timer.Behiavours
member.summary: The event defined in the editor.
